author: tng
msg: Some bug fixes + Cleanup.  Fixed by Khaled Noaman.

author: tng
msg: Let user add their encoding to the intrinsic mapping table.  Added by Khaled Noaman.

author: tng
msg: const should be used instead of static const.  Fixed by Khaled Noaman.

author: lehors
msg: fixed replaceChild to handle the case where a node is replaced

author: tng
msg: EnumVal/Makefile.in uses '-ptr${OUTDIR}' as a compile option which is specifically
for Solaris template directory. Platform other than Solaris may give a warning
saying 'option -ptr is not supported'.  This Makefile.in should be guarded so that
'-ptr${OUTDIR}' is only included for Solaris build.
